name: Pantai Premier Pathology
introHk: 馬來西亞規模最大的醫學診斷企業之一，隸屬全球知名醫療集團IHH Healthcare旗下。
introCn: 隶属于全球市值排名前十的医疗集团IHH　Healthcare旗下，是马来西亚一家规模庞大，并提供全面诊断服务的医学实验室。本是次合作乃东南亚地区推广早期癌症筛查的一个重要里程碑；同时亦是我司在马来西亚推动创新生物科技的广泛应用的第一步。
introEn: Affiliated with the renowned global wellbeing specialist, IHH Healthcare, Pantai Premier Pathology is one of Malaysia’s largest diagnostics laboratories.

name: Global Medical Technologies
introHk: 一家位於菲律賓的醫療技術公司，主要業務為向菲律賓國內引進世界各地的先進技術，以向醫護人員、患者及消費者提供健康測試和診斷技術的選擇。
introCn: GMT是一家位于菲律宾的医疗技术公司，为菲律宾国内引进世界各地的先进健康测试和诊断技术，从而协助医护人员通过科学知识，深入了解患者病况。他们提供多元化的诊断服务，包括肿瘤科、营养科、内科及皮肤科等。
introEn: A medical distribution group based in the Philippines, supporting local communities by bringing globally advanced technologies in the country to provide healthcare practitioners, patients and customers with access to different healthcare and diagnostic services.

name: Yourgene Health
introHk: 一家總部設於英國且於倫敦證交所上市的分子診斷公司，主要從事基因測序技術開發和商業化，其業務遍佈台灣、新加坡、美國及加拿大等地區。
introEn: Listed on the London Stock Exchange, UK-headquartered Yourgene Health is leading the way in international molecular diagnostics and commercialised genomic services via branches in Taipei, Singapore, the U.S., and Canada.

name: Lifestrands Genomics
introHk: 一家業務橫跨新加坡、馬來西亞及越南的基因科技集團，隸屬醫學診斷集團Pathology Asia Holdings旗下，其子公司GenomixLab是馬來西亞第一家獲得CAP認證的醫學實驗室。
introEn: A genomic technology pioneer whose operations cover Singapore, Malaysia and Vietnam, Lifestrands Genomics is a member of the Pathology Asia Holdings, a genomics group. Its sister company, GenomixLab, is Malaysia’s first CAP certified laboratory.

name: Pascific Laboratories
introHk: 一家業務橫跨菲律賓、新加坡及印度的病理診斷集團，主要業務為以精準醫療為方針的病理學及分子診斷。
introEn: A medical diagnostics group operating in the Philippines, Singapore and India, Pascific Laboratories focuses on precision pathology and molecular diagnostics.

name: Tempcon
introHk: 一家總部位於多哈的醫療器械供應商，致力為當地的私人醫療機構、公立醫療服務、連鎖診所及大型企業提供從日常消費品、試劑到高端科技型的醫療器械。
introEn: Headquartered in Doha, Tempcon provides local public and private medical institutions, chain clinics, as well large corporates an extensive range of medical products, including daily consumables, laboratory reagents and top-notch medical devices.

name: Catalyst Bioscience
introHk: 一家位於澳門的生物科技經銷商，致力為當地的醫療機構提供高端科技測試。
introEn: A Macau-based biotechnology distributor dedicated to providing high-end testing technology to local medical institutions.
